name: Rich, Creamy Macaroni and Cheese
preparation: Cook macaroni according to package directions.
Preheat Multipurpose Pot over medium heat. Add oil and butter.
When butter melts into oil, whisk in flour. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
Slowly add milk, whisking to combine. Stir in CCB Dip Mix. Bring to a simmer.
Using a wooden spoon, stir in cheddar, one cup at a time. Season to taste with cayenne pepper, Salt and Pepper.
Add cooked pasta to pot. Stir to combine.
tips: Serve with a crisp green salad.
